body_html:
Segmentation faults are rarely expected behavior :)
Can you share code to reproduce the problem? Ideally, as small a code snippet as possible that reproduces it.

More information would also be helpful, such as:

  • Details of the segmentation fault (do you have a stack trace for example?)
  • Where is the segmentation fault occurring - on all workers? on the PS? etc.

(CC @tatianashp )

body:
Segmentation faults are rarely expected behavior :)
Can you share code to reproduce the problem? Ideally, as small a code snippet as possible that reproduces it.

More information would also be helpful, such as:
- Details of the segmentation fault (do you have a stack trace for example?)
- Where is the segmentation fault occurring - on all workers? on the PS? etc.

(CC @tatianashp )
